title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][The Erebus——混沌之地]奇妙又危险的神祕地底世界[永久更新]
author: 蒙特拉
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1094822247 于 2019-9-19 04:31 编辑 


-2014.05.22-
[[模组最新更新日期:2019.3.27]

· 简介：在地底深处，有这样一个维度 - 那里处处爬满了节肢动物;那片土地曾由大地之母盖亚统治，但如今陷入了极度的混沌中，各种敌对生物频繁出没....而玩家即将踏进这个奇妙又危险的地方，揭开它的秘密。
· 模组一览:https://www.bilibili.com/video/av42238274
十分危险的维度
  致命的危险潜藏在暗处
    各种各样的生物

      丰富的生物群系
进入这个维度前需要充分的准备以及良好的心理素质。模组实况  已获得up主授权https://www.bilibili.com/video/av28976264视频原地址：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av28976264
· 授权&汉化&其他
作者Vadis365、Bryuf、chylex、Dylan4ever、ganymedes01、sokratis12GR、theestarriol官方wikiMCMod百科
汉化问题建议使用自动汉化更新模组
授权证明discord联系作者获得的授权，可以加入discord群查看聊天记录
· 教程&安装方法&注明
教程贴点击查看
安装方法1.下载模组2.复制模组jar3.粘贴进mods文件夹图文教程方法二
注明来自搬运悬赏令
模组版本游戏版本更新日期下载地址1.0.301.12.22019年3月27日curseforge0.4.71.7.102016年6月4日curseforge0.2pre31.6.42014年5月24日curseforge
更新日志此为英文原版更新日志
1.6.4版本模组更新日志2014-5-24- Fixed Amber Brick Walls appearing opaque.- Fixed Sapling misbehaviour.- Fixed Crate GUI textures.- Fixed a whole bunch of other things.1.7.10版本模组更新日志2015-2-1**Added New Dungeon to Volcanic Desert**Added New Dungeon Mobs and Drops.Added New Dungeon Related Items, Blocks, Spawners etc.New Boss Fight and Drop.Lava Lakes and Rivers added to Volcanic desert.Added New Titan Stew Food Items.Added New Rhino Armour set.Added some sounds to various mobs.Added Cabbage Crop and Food Item.
2015-4-12Requires Forge 1.7.10-10.13.3.1360 or later to run.Mainly a bugfix and assets change update.BLOCK OF BONES IS NOW FIXED!Wither webs can now be silk harvested with shears.Updated to be compliant with the new forge fluid registry.Grasshopper breeding and locust spawns are nerfed.Fossil Ore should be more common now.Several texture changes and some things have been renamed.Some bug fixes on rendering and a few 'under' the hood changes.
2015-8-13Removed all Animation magic (Hearts Crafting Altar etc.)Lots more Texture changes.
Block O' bones now picks up items from the ground on player death.
Bombardier Beetle added back.
Music now plays in dimension again (configurable).
Player re-spawn in dimension re-enabled (configurable).
Animated Chest, Animated Bamboo Crate and Animated Petrified Crafting bench now follow owner.
Some recipes changed to show in NEI.
Umber Golem Statue hardness now fixed.
Sporeling mob model removed and replaced with Crushling.
Portal World height bug fixed.
Some tweaks to mob movement speeds.
Horn of the swarm now summons Worker Bees not Grasshoppers.
Smoothie maker now has NEI handler.
Smoothie maker now drops contents.
Lots of other minor tweaks to some items and code....
A fair bit of code refactoring and updating (under the hood).
Probably more things but that is all I can recall for now :)
2015-11-19-Squished hundreds of bugs (too many to list)
-Added fences/fence gates to most of the Erebus woods
-Added alternate texture for all planks
-Added a milk bambucket (moooo)
-Smoothie maker should be a lot... smoother... now
-Max speed bow now animates
-Added Wand of Preservation. Shoots Amber Stars to trap entities. Mine them with silk touch so you can transport them!
-Preserved the Wand of Preservation
-Completely re-worked portal mechanics (Thanks NeptunePink!)
-Whetstone is now applied using Anvils and costs XP. Can be applied to any tool that accepts the Sharpness enchantment!
-New texture for the altars
-Added the Death Compass. A Compass that points to the place you last died. You'll get one when you pass away (RIP)
-Added the Balsam tree
-Added Honey Pot Ants. Feed them sugar so you can harness their honey (yummy!)
-Added bombardier beetle larvae. (kablooie!)
-Fix gliders being all derpy
-Powered Gliders can now be dyed (not died)
2015-11-19-Fixed crash with honey pot ants
2016-01-14This released was a little rushed. There may be bugs/glitches.Nerfed Rhino Beetle attack range.Added textures for Milk fluid in smoothie maker.
Optimisation of mob spawning code.
Added Quartz Ore to world gen.
Smoothie maker now accepts bambuckets of milk.
Added Adventurer's Armchair as a settable re-spawn point in dimension - try placing a bed - they don't explode anymore.
Added default re-spawn point to last used portal location.
Added Blaze rods to Fire Ant Soldier drops.
Changed the way glowing mobs work to remove lighting update lag - YAY!
Fixed a glitch using the Wand of Animation on colossal crate.
Block o' Bones compass can be crafted in to x1 bonemeal :P
Added Bamboo bits to Ore Dictionary for compatibility with Growthcraft.
Changed Wasp Attack range.
Changed the way anti-venom works - now has a fancy bar and duration.
Added Stag Beetle Mob and Items - can be tamed and bred - Left alt key will mine blocks when mounted - drops hearts for health/food and mandibles used in crafting and exo plate.
Added Sarcastic Czech Giant mushroom to world gen, 2x2 of small mushroom can be bonemealed.
Added Zombie Ant Soldier to Fungal forest.
Added Zombie Ant Plate - can be crafted in to rotten flesh.
Lots of other things I can't remember.
Please note - some WIP things are in the mod which are not implemented yet. They are labelled WIP.
2016-01-30- Fixed Smoothies from setting you on fire and stacking being broken when consumed.- Added event to check if players spawn on top of the bedrock ceiling - if so they are moved to the correct spawn position.- Dragonflies should now drop players if there is a solid block above them to avoid player suffocation glitch.- Added Mod specific Recipes to enable Erebus Wood Fences and Wood Gates to be crafted.- Changed some rendering of mobs in Preserved Amber.- Code Refactoring and some other fixes.- Fixed Smoothies from setting you on fire and stacking being broken when consumed.
2016-01-31- Fixed Spider's webs not being placed correctly- Change the hit-box and attack range on several mobs:        Zombie Ants   Zombie Ant Soldiers   Titan Beetle   Scorpion- Stopped Scorpions being able to grab players through blocks- Scorpions can now only grab players that they can see- Stopped player taking suffocation damage when riding mobs
2016-02-05- Removed option not to spawn an Erebus portal in the dimension - it broke lots of things.- Block o' Bones now used the player drops event to collect items - should now work with backpacks etc.- Fixed Mobs attacking players during death animations.- Added cool down to Scorpion grab attack.- Stopped poison mobs applying effect on collision and move it to attack.- Changed several more mobs' hit ranges.- Fixed Adventurer's Armchair re-spawn 'judder glitch'.- Changed some mob AI's to work quicker.- Added configuration option for Antlion Maze Dungeon Frequency (Warning don't touch unless you know what you are doing).- Changed Player repositioning on re-spawn- Added Prickly Pair Cactus Crop, to Volcanic Desert, and associated food items .
2016-05-14Some localisation stuffs - thanks Ghostlyr ;)Localise Keybind Strings.Added tooltips to Glider and Powered Glider Showing Kebinds and general info.Added container localisation to Silo and Animated Chest.Fixed Wasp dagger tooltip Derp.Changed redgem worldgen to mitigate possible biome decorating crash.Added Boss Bars to Dungeon Minibosses - makes finding the Antlion maze easier.Increased Crushroom health LOTS to make it more of a challenge.Added configuration for Mob health multipliers - mod can now be tweaked for people with stupid OP mods.Added configuration for Mob damage multipliers - see above (stupid op mods... grrrr).Added configuration for making all biome fog colours just black - requires game restart for config to work (special feature for Dawn Of The Void Modpack creator Darkosto)Wasps should only attack players they can see - may fix reports of being hit from underneath platformsFixed a very old glitch on the Big Bamboo crate's buttons when INV tweaks is loaded.Various tweaks and code refactoring.
2016-06-04Fixed critical crash when using wand of animation to animate blocks.Made Wasp Sword & Augmented Scorpion Pincer enchantable.Added a check to Antlion Maze gen to stop multiples generating over each other.Made Animated Bamboo Crate & Animated Chest invulnerable.Reverted Mob Spawning code back to more frequent spawning because efficiency is for wimps.Added missing Russian lang localisations for glider tool tips ;)
1.12.2版本模组更新日志
2019-03-26
*** CRITICAL FIX: ***
* Fixed the portal regularly spawning players in walls/not spawning a return portal


Fixes:
* Fixed the wasp/scorpion advancement triggering on any damage taken.
* Quartz ore now smelts into an item (for when you harvest it with Silk Touch).
* Jumping Spiders no longer suffocate when climbing beneath overhanging blocks.
* Fixed Red Gem drops crashing with other mods (EnderIO & certain Tinker' enchants).
* Antlion Lair generation should no longer bork and cause surrounding sand to block update.



Additions:
* New advancements!
* Advancements can now be localised.
* Water Striders allow you to walk over Quicksand.
* 3D models for a variety of plants.
* Gneiss Boulders in the Volcanic Desert.



Changes:
* Changed some more textures, reducing overlap with the Betweenlands legacy assets.
* Reorganised and tweaked some of the advancements.
* Arthropod mobs colliding with Insect Repellent no longer trigger annoying sounds.
* Wasp Daggers now poison (both thrown and melee)
* Lava Lakes are now lined with Volcanic Rock as opposed to regular Smooth Stone.


2019-03-12**** CRITICAL BUG FIX ****

The Erebus 1.0.27 [archived due to critical crash]
Additions: 
- Advancements galore! One tab aids new players in constructing the portal, one tab contains general Erebus advancements and one focuses on farming. 


Changes: 
- Changed Mud functionality to be more mud-like and less odd. 
- Water Striders now allow you to walk over Mud without getting slowed or sinking into it. 
- Many, many art changes, most notably to planks. 
- Extenders can now be rotated by right-clicking them with the Bamboo Wrench.



The Erebus 1.0.28Fixes:- Fixed crash introduced in last update due to spawner code having to be made compatible with another mod.- Finally Fixed Jumping on Beetle Larva so they go squish! \o/
2019-02-24* Fixed another issue with Erebus food stacks size array.* Changed some logic on Bambuckets again so they stack after being used.* Changed incorrect orientation of Jade tools in off hand.* Renamed Bamboo 'Logs' and 'Saplings' to Colossal Bamboo.* Changed some movement speeds to some mobs (Rhino, Stag and Titan beetles, Lava Web Spider and Antlions).* Fixed crash when using composter with a hopper and added missing Item Capabilities to it.* Updated several Tile Entities with inventories so they don't reset on updates eg. rotated with wrenches etc.* Fixed some isuues with Smoothie recipes return wrong items.* Smoothie Maker now allows 1 item in slots (please note it still consumes from all slots, only add what it needs - needs a recode).* Removed mob griefing rule from Harvester Ant's AI as it was unnecessary.* Changed the way the Compound Goggles apply NV to attempt to make it work better with other mods
2018-12-15* HOTFIX VERSION* Fixed a deep hidden issue with ore dictionary problems and dyes due to a broken recipe (Thanks KnightMiner and CazadorSniper).This may also fix related issues experienced with Refined storage, Tinkers' etc.
from 1.0.24 (now archived)* Fixed Bamboo crates crashing when full and hoppers try to insert.* Fixed Particle Crash when Umbergolem Statues were broken.* Removed more ItemStack legacy code.* Changed Sub biomes Generation code.* Fixed dupe bug with Wand of animation and Portal Keystone.* Added a basic block blacklist to the Wand of Animation - does not support metadata.* Added Flower Stems and Giant Lilly Pad Blocks as green dye
2018-09-09Lots of things changed; I may miss some but the main things are below.
* Major Changes.* Dimension no longer stays loaded when no players are in it.* Moved the Broodmother boss Baobab to the Ulterior Outback - it is now a Giant Eucalyptus.* Complete re-code of the way boss dungeons are generated - The dungeons should be fairly regular in the biomes now.* Antlion Mazes Should now Spawn the Pyramid section IN the Volcanic dessert and not on the biome edge.* Antlion Mazes will not generate within 1000 blocks of another Pyramid but WILL always generate in the biome if not.* Brood Mother Trees will gen in available space and not less than 200 blocks from other trees (it's not that frequent due to the space it needs).* Death compass is now the same as the standalone mod featurewise.
* New Things.* Added a Dung Pile scattered feature to the Ulterior Outback (and all associated blocks etc).* Added a Locust scattered feature to the Subterranean Savannah (and all associated blocks etc).* Changed W.I.P. Petrified forest biome to have hanging webs instead of thorns.* A few Texture tweaks on various things* Added Wasp sword back to drop from Wasp Spawners.
* Fixes (more than I can remember here)* Bullrushes Broken on Mud Blocks dupe bug fixed* Stag beetle data bug fixed.* Many pieces of legacy code with 'null' itemstacks have be fixed (should fix food eating bug).* Bamboo Extender breaking particle client crash bug fixed.* Small mobs should no longer suffocate when 'in' bamboo bridges.* Quake Hammer Gui render no longer crashes client when cheated in and added to active hotbar slot.* Incorrect and missing lang localisations fixed for various blocks and items.* Player rendering for glider (athough still wonky in SMP) should now not cause issues with other mods events due to priorities.
Please post any issues you find on our github using the 'issues' link above.*Note - there are a few NYI items and blocks that you may find in JEI, use at own risk - The mod is undergoing a phase of content additions so many things have had to be re-coded to allow for future expansion.
2018-03-15* Fixed crash from Crushroom spore balls in SMP.* Fixed ALL custom item models not rendering correct when some other mods were used with Erebus.* Added new WIP Biome (Petrified Forest) - had to be included due to the above fixes needing a release - will be changed.* Added new Crop Block and item, Mandrake & Mandrake root, no use other than a food stuff atm.* Added Generation in new biome of Umbergravel (gravel, but umber :P ).* Dust, Dust Layers, Petrified Wood Rock and Volcanic rock generation - no uses yet other than terrain.* Pools of Formic acid added to new biome.* Added temporary spawn list for some mobs for new biome so it isn't empty (will change).* New Mob textures for Cicada, Grasshopper and Locust.* Fixed long term model derp with Grasshopper and Locust antennae being offset.* Other things I may have forgotten, but probably needed doing for some reason or another.
2018-02-27Changed worldgen in:*Submerged Swamp*Added much more ground plant generation.Added Mossbark Trees to biome.Made mud generate more frequently on the ground.*Underground Jungle*Increased small ground plants and made it quite overgrown.*Elysian Fields*Added small rivers and water areas at low down levels.
Fixed Proper efficiency of Jade axe on wood.Balsam logs now drop resin NOT amber stars.Punchroom mob no longer takes fall damage.
Various textures updated an changed for blocks and items - more to come.
2018-02-24** Essential Fix - Monster spawner blocks now work again after previous update changed the names of mobs **
Mahogany big tree leaf decay set to false on generation.
Bambuckets should now have intended behavior.

Please keep reporting bugs to the issue tracker - it really helps with the Beta fixes.Thanks,Me.
2018-02-23Fixed 
*Major Problem With Build Craft causing crash on load due to Erebus block drops .
*Middle-mouse clicking Umberstone incorrectly giving Umbercobble.
*All Erebus doors no longer instabreak.
*Bamboo no longer insta-breaks.
*Can milk beetles with an iron bucket (cannot drink it from iron buckets yet though).
*Drinking beetle juice now kills bot fly larvae.
*Erebus walls now have correct collision boxes.
2018-02-21Fixed crash with BOP wasps having a duplicate entity ID for it's stats - shouldn't be a problem ever again as Erebus entities now contain a prefix name specific to the mod.
2018-02-21Many things Removed/Changed.Some new things added.I would suggest using JEI to explore the mod's content until a full changelog is added.Old worlds from 1.7.10 WILL NOT be compatible with this version.Please report any bugs, crashes, glitches etc on the issue tracker.

搬运不易，且看且珍惜

replies.txt_content:
最man的老鼠 发表于 2019-4-18 12:27
我回头帮你向作者反馈一下
谢谢，我还是具体描述一下：这个mod里夜视仪带上以后会给一个夜视II的buff，然后以其他方式给自己夜视II的buff就会被马上移除（比如用指令）。刚好那个夜视附魔给的也是夜视II的buff，带上带有那个附魔的头盔就会在夜视和正常状况下不断切换
